title: Late-'70s font(?).
content:
Can anyone help me find a type reminiscent of fonts used in heuristic workbooks of the late ’70s? I think it’s sort-of a delicate slab-serif, but a bit more ornate.

Think sepia-toned picture frames and bell bottoms.

Thanks.

 [‹ Sourcing old Letraset catalogues](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122053120/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47564 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for "old" Melissa font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122053120/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19238 "Go to next forum topic")
author: R.P.McMurphy
